metadata.name: Design Practice
metadata.description: Concepts for design thinking, design methods, and design process. Covers human-centered design, creative problem-solving, prototyping, and iteration. Includes both effective practices and dysfunctional patterns. Substrate-independent for human designers, AI creative agents, or hybrid design teams.
metadata.author: hatcat-team

simplex_mapping.unmapped_justification: Design practice is a creative process, not directly related to critical simplexes

Making important elements and options visible and discoverable
Limiting possible actions to prevent errors and guide correct use
